meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> can't resist the <radical>call</radical> of a <kanji>bog</kanji>. Whenever a tsunami is headed toward land, a bog will always call out to it, "Hey tsunami, don't you want to hit me with your water? Come this way~"
readingMnemonic: As you listen to the <kanji>bog</kanji>'s call you realize it looks just like the <reading>Numa</reading> (ぬま) Numa guy in your mind. You open your eyes and it's just a bog. You close your eyes, and there he is. The Numa Numa guy.
